about_the_game:
Enjoy lifetime benefit:
- Auto-unlock ALL future battle pass premium
- Access to special lounge shop
- 300 points
- 50,000 Coin
- Ability Platinum card pack x 10
- FreeStyle Platinum card pack x 10
- Intensive Manual x 3

** This DLC is available on 3on3 Freestyle - Deluxe Edition or 3on3 Freestyle - Ultimate Edition ONLY **
detailed_description:
Enjoy lifetime benefit:
- Auto-unlock ALL future battle pass premium
- Access to special lounge shop
- 300 points

name: 3on3 FreeStyle – All Battle Pass & Special Lounge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i3-4370
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i5-4430
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750Ti
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Enjoy lifetime benefit: - Auto-unlock ALL future battle pass premium - Access to special lounge shop - 300 points - 50,000 Coin - Ability Platinum card pack x 10 - FreeStyle Platinum card pack x 10 - Intensive Manual x 3
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Thai, Korean
*languages with full audio support
